Class MessageEncoder

java.lang.Object
us.mn.state.dot.sonar.MessageEncoder
public class MessageEncoder extends Object
A message encoder provides a Java API for encoding messages to the SONAR wire protocol.
Author:
Douglas Lau

      public void encode(Message m) throws IOException
      Encode one message with the given code. This may only be called on the Task Processor thread.
      Throws:
      IOException

      Throws:
      IOException

    • encode

      IOException
